item.description:
Come join us at our October meetup. Meet, mix, and socialize with others from the web and high tech community.

New at the October Meetup
The WebSquared meetup's mission is to facilitate entrepreneurship and innovation by connecting people and promoting ideas. To this end, the October Meetup will include the following:


  • Resume table for all you talented people looking for a new fun and challenging gig
  • Professional services table for professionals such as freelance designers, attorneys, systems architects to promote their work
  • User experience evaluation station: If you are developing an interactive product you can get a quick evaluation of its usability


Where and When We're Meeting
We'll be meeting at the Cambridge Brewing Company starting at 8PM. We will have a table where you can get a name tag, and you are welcomed to roam and socialize where you like. Ask the host or hostess where our table is located if you can't find it. (It should be close to the bar.)

See you there!

Sergio
item.how_to_find_us: Find our table near to the bar or ask host or hostess.
item.name: WebSquared October Meetup: The Social Mixer for the Boston Web Community
